channel.title: A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content on A Hugo website

item.title: HUGO issue
item.description: hugo-theme-minosというかHugoのissue 投稿手順 options(blogdown.rmd=TRUE) または options(blogdown.ext = ‘.Rmd’) 数式が表示できない themes > hugo-theme-minos > layouts > partials > footer.html に下記★を

item.title: OptionPremium
item.description: プットオプションを月にいくら買えばよいかを検討する ブラックショールズモデルの一般的には変数は以下 S：株価 σ：ボラティリティ r：無リスク金利 q

item.title: VIX CFD 価格調整額
item.description: datatable(tmp1, filter = 'top', style = 'bootstrap', class = 'table-bordered table-condensed', # class = 'cell-border stripe', extensions = 'ColReorder', options = list(dom = 'Rlfrtip', colReorder = list(realtime = TRUE), buttons = I('colvis'), scrollX = TRUE, scrollCollapse = TRUE ) ) {"x":{"style":"bootstrap","filter":"top","filterHTML":"

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
